-e ---

𓀀 ⋍ 𓀂 ⚠️

Strange redundant gardiner for A1 𓀀

a1 𓀀 <<
a2 𓀁 yo
a3 𓀂 ⋍ 𓀀 --

… 𓀂 𓁐 𓏥 person suffix …ter / …er Ägypter

… 𓀂 𓁐 𓏥 person suffix -i < he

𒂷𒂊 ĝá-e Gwo Ego 我 eigen < hegen @ 𓀂 Hacke

𓀀 (flat foot ) vs 𓀂 Hacke

r>l lui el …

𒇽 LU₂ ( 𒇽 𒂟𒈨𒌍 𒄑𒉼 archers 𓐮 𓀎 𓀀 𓏥 ( 𒂟 troops) )

A3 𓀂 hiim (him,ihm) vs 𓆑 heer (her/ihr)
